Text.Page:
Two primary difficulties here, .

First of all, the argon remnants throughout Raga Kabash. They seem to be heading south to what we believe is some sort of transmission room.

Second, I need parts from a {@Creature:46#7005#grellok spire}. Research, you know.
Thank you. The grellok spire is interesting, but...you know who would be fascinated by this? Rhentar, who's working in the Strifecore Chamber. This matches his line of inquiry perfectly.
This is from a grellok spire, you say? I haven't been able to get close to one. Remind me to thank Nevian, if I ever leave this chamber.
